categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ragel was a male Human who served as a sergeant in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed in Coronet Spaceport in the Incorporation Islands region of the planet Corellia, distributing armor to other Imperial forces.
Sergeant Ragel appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Heavy Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
